description:
This is an update for the Nintendo 3DS software SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3.
After downloading this update, an icon will not appear on the Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu.
Data for this update will appear in the downloadable content section of System Settings, so please be careful not to delete it.
The following changes have been made:
-Various text messages have been edited to reduce user confusion.
name:
SAMURAI WARRIORS:
Chronicles 3: Update
